issue.title: Build a Simple Todo CLI
issue.body:
## Overview
Build a simple command-line todo list manager in TypeScript.

## Requirements

### Features
1. Add a todo item
2. List all todos
3. Mark a todo as complete
4. Delete a todo

### Technical
- TypeScript
- Store todos in a JSON file (todos.json)
- Use commander.js for CLI
- Keep it simple

### Commands
```
todo add "Buy groceries"
todo list
todo complete 1
todo delete 1
```

### File Structure
```
src/
  index.ts    # CLI entry point with commander
  todo.ts     # Todo operations (add, list, complete, delete)
  storage.ts  # JSON file storage
  types.ts    # TypeScript interfaces
```

Keep it minimal!

ems.task: Create project foundation with .gitignore, package.json (with dependencies: commander, typescript, @types/node, ts-node), tsconfig.json, and project directory structure

analysisSummary: Build a simple TypeScript CLI todo manager with add/list/complete/delete commands using commander.js and JSON file storage. Project includes proper TypeScript configuration, dependency setup, and modular architecture with separated concerns for CLI parsing, business logic, storage, and types.

pendingEMs.task: Implement data models and persistence layer - define Todo interface in types.ts, implement JSON file read/write operations in storage.ts to handle todos.json
Implement todo business logic in todo.ts (add, list, complete, delete functions) and CLI interface in index.ts using commander.js to parse commands and invoke appropriate todo operations
